articles.title: OpenCore Computer attempts sale of Hackintosh systems - AppleInsider
articles.description: OpenCore Computer has launched its first desktop computer billed as a "zero-compromise Hackintosh" preinstalled with macOS Catalina and Windows 10 Pro, a project highly likely to face intense scrutiny from Apple's legal team.
